title: Best of The Program | Guest: Rep. Kat Cammack | 11/10/21
description:
Pat Gray joins to discuss the Rep. Paul Gosar anime controversy. The red scare is now about the red states. Glenn discusses RedBalloon, a conservative service that connects people with job opportunities. Rep. Kat Cammack calls in to expose the most egregious parts of President Biden’s "Build Back Better" plan.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
